thread.title: China tries to extract pledge of compliance from U.S. tech firms
thread.title_full: China tries to extract pledge of compliance from U.S. tech firms - San Francisco Chronicle

author: New York Times
title: China tries to extract pledge of compliance from U.S. tech firms
text: HONG KONG — The Chinese government, which has long used its country’s vast market as leverage over U.S. technology companies, is now asking some of those firms to directly pledge their commitment to contentious policies that could require them to turn user data and intellectual property over to the government.
